name: Banana Cranberry Bread
author: LINDA VOLLRATH
summary: I always have leftover cranberry sauce after Thanksgiving, so I created this recipe which is very moist and delicious.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease two 9x5 inch loaf pans
In a large bowl, cream together the sugar and shortening until light and fluffy
Beat in eggs, and mix in bananas, cranberry sauce, milk, and vanilla
In a separate bowl, mix together flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, and nutmeg
Gradually blend flour mixture into the banana mixture
Pour into the prepared loaf pans
Bake for 50 to 60 minutes in the preheated oven, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean
Cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack, and cool completely
